text: Shankar Oram is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Odisha Legislative Assembly from Biramitrapur in the 2019 Odisha Legislative Assembly election as a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party.My NetaOdisha Assembly: Finance Minister Explains State’s Debt Burden StatusBJP announces candidates for 100 Assembly constituencies in OdishaBJP gets three seats, BJD two ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sundergarh district Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Odisha Category:Odisha MLAs 2019–
title: Shankar Oram
